IncidentSuppNarrative.NarrativeText:
Attachments

    -NCMEC Cybertips # 158855840

Narrative
On March 20, 2023, the Maryland State Police Computer Crimes Section /Maryland Internet Crimes Against Children Task Force received NCMEC CyberTip # 158855840. The CyberTip, generated by Microsoft, indicated that a subject uploaded child pornography to the internet. The CyberTip were assigned to TFC Burnett for investigation.

The CyberTip provided the following information pertaining to the suspect: Peer-to-Peer
lient: BingImage
IP Address: 173.44.75.203 at 03-17-2023 14:32:13 UTC
Peer to Peer Filenames: ee425a63-0792-472d-8c79-93aace80ccae.jpg

    TFC Burnett reviewed this CyberTip and observed it to contain one reported image file that constitutes child pornography as it is defined under Maryland law. The file is described below:

Filename #1: ee425a63-0792-472d-8c79-93aace80ccae.jpg
Description: This file is of a nude Prepubescent Caucasian female child laying down with her legs spread up in the air. There is also an adult male’s erect penis that ejaculated on the child’s vagina. The child is devoid of pubic hair and lack of breast budding.  Based on the size and physical characteristics, the child appears to be 2-4 years of age.

    TFC Burnett conducted a query of the IP address through an open-source database. The IP address “173.44.75.203” is registered through Breezeline and geo-locates to the area of Lexington Park, MD.
    
    TFC Burnett authored a subpoena for Breezeline (IP address), it was sent to the Howard County State’s Attorney’s Office.

    A future knock and talk will be conducted.

Case Status
OPEN / PENDING ADDITIONAL INVESTIGATION

ATTACHMENTS:
- Subpoena return documents (4)

NARRATIVE:
   Since the initial investigation, TFC Burnett submitted a court ordered subpoena to Breezeline.  On 3/30/2023, she received compliance and records pertaining to the subpoena.

The IP address listed in the initial report resolved to:
Subscriber Name: SCOTT DARE
Subscriber & Billing Address: 20796 RED ROSE CT, LEXINGTON PARK, MD 20653-2452
Account Activation Date: 08/31/2009
Account Deactivation Date: Account is active.
Associated Email Addresses: cldbizzyb82@gmail.com
Associated Phone Numbers: 240-298-9897 301-737-1976
IP Address History: 173.44.75.203

   On 3/31/2023 at approximately 0630 hours, TFC Burnett and Sgt. Pitcher responded to the listed address in an attempt to make contact with Scott Dare.  Upon arrival, there were lights on inside the residence but no one responded to the door.  Sgt. Pitcher attempted to contact Dare via telephone, with negative results.  Sgt. Pitcher left a voicemail for Dare.  

   On 3/31/2023 at approximately 0917 hours, Dare made contact with Sgt. Pitcher via telephone.  Dare advised he was at his residence and would await the arrival of Sgt. Pitcher.  At approximately 1015 hours, Sgt. Pitcher responded back to Dare's residence.  Sgt. Pitcher met with Scott Christian Dare (W/M DOB: 9/1/1959).  Sgt. Pitcher informed Dare of the reason for the investigation and what it entailed.  Dare advised he does utilize Breezeline as his internet provider.  Dare advised he is not familiar with BingImage and he has never viewed/seen/possessed/distributed child pornography.  Dare stated he runs a security sweep on his computer, and he does recall there was a recent incident where he was alerted to several harmful files were located.  Dare indicated he did not view the files and they were deleted from his computer.  Dare was advised of several security measures he could take to ensure his computer and internet were safe.  Dare indicated he did not know much about computers or the internet.  

   No further action was taken.  Case closed by exception.
